entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
